title: Perona is Back! || One Piece Episode 455 & 456 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering episodes 455 and 456 of One Piece, focusing on the Straw Hat's Separation Serial storylines including Robin's rescue and Usopp's struggles.

title: Sanji vs Queen Caroline | One Piece REACTION - Episode 454, 455, & 456
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction video covering episodes 454-456 of One Piece, including the Straw Hat's Separation Serial storylines.

title: Episode 455: Shot Through The Eyes
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast episode 455 featuring special guest Miles Thomas from Crunchyroll for a Manga Recap of One Piece Manga Chapter 854, 'What Are You Doing?'. Note: This podcast episode number does not correspond to anime episode 455.

title: Watching One Piece: Straw Hats' Separation Serial (Episodes 453-456)
author: victorie552
description: A blog post reviewing episodes 453-456 of the Straw Hat's Separation Serial, noting that Robin got the worst deal of all the Straw Hats but was also the most badass, with Usopp's man-eating island not far behind.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers episodes 453-456 of Separation Serial only

author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: A comprehensive recap and analysis of the Straw Hat's Separation Serial arc, covering all episodes and providing context for each character's individual journey after being separated by Bartholomew Kuma.

title: One Piece: Oda Finally Reveals The Reason Behind The Creation Of Tequila Wolf
author: GameRant Staff
description: An article discussing Eiichiro Oda's revelation about the true purpose of Tequila Wolf and the World Government's 700-year construction project, connecting it to rising sea levels and Vegapunk's discoveries.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Vegapunk arc and world lore revelations

title: One Piece: The Split Of the Straw Hat Pirates, Explained
author: GameRant Staff
description: An article explaining the separation of the Straw Hat Pirates after the Sabaody Archipelago incident, covering where each crew member ended up and how it prepared them for the New World.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers the separation through the timeskip
